relation: Great for these types of students
UAB is great for self-motivated students.
UAB is actually really pricy, and it's hard for a new teacher to pay the tuition without help.
UAB offers students like me a variety of ways to get an advanced degree.
I am in the graduate program, and I have learned so much about my field.
pageTitle: University of Alabama at Birmingham (UAB) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {341922=Zombie Walk is every October. There are two Starbucks on campus. Non-medical students will take classes mostly in a two block area., 583106=They are are currently renovating the student center where Chick-Fil-A and Taco Bell were located. So the selection is somewhat limited, but you have three cafeteria based areas one of which that remains open till 1:00 A. M all of which also provide vegetarian options. There is also a nearby Subway and Starbucks that accept meal plans, dining dollars, or blazer bucks as well as numerous food trucks, vending machines, and Simply To Go food stations. Slightly off campus you have the entirety of downtown Birmingham at your disposal with Al's(mediterranean food), Maschino's(Smoothies), and 5th avenue which has the iconic Mellow Mushroom available., 513651=There are many restaurant options in and around the campus. With a dozen or more fast food places and sit-down restaurants. There is even a Cajun restaurant that sends a food van around campus that always smells like amazing seafood., 167126=The are many food options on campus. Chick Fil A and Taco Bell are right on campus and you can use your meal plans there! The Diner is open until 2:00 a.m for those nights that you have stayed up to study and now you are starving!, 52152=Anyone looking for a quality education will fit in at UAB. I'm so thankful and proud to be part of the LAST undergrad class of Health Information Management students at UAB - after I graduate in 2015, the program will become a masters program and no longer offered to undergrad students. This is still really cool though because UAB is one of very few colleges to offer HIM at all! If you want to be in the medical profession in any way, shape or form, UAB is your school. From dentistry, optometry, and medicine to nursing, health information management and psychology, UAB has everything any student could ever want in the way of a career in a health profession,, 701699=Despite being in the center of Birmingham, UAB feels like its in its own little bubble. UAB is also currently undergoing a lot of renovation, with a new freshman dorm and student centering being built for incoming students of 2015-2016. Lastly, UAB is arguable the best medical school in the state of Alabama., 468035=The food at UAB is pretty good. The only downside is that most of the resturant areas at UAB close fairly early and the only one open late is the Diner. But, like the name implies, the Diner mainly only sells diner food which isn't the most healthy thing to eat at 10:30 at night., 722336=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 83202=this college is one of the best colleges in the country, i visited during the summer of 2011 and had an amazing time the campus was beautiful and it is in the top 10 for most safest college, 348659=Do not plan classes at 6:45 am or 8:00 am if you are not a morning person. Pay attention to all deadlines from registration to a withdrawal date., 240297=I am very pleased with my education thus far at UAB. I feel fortunate to be there and look forward to graduating in 2015}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Simone from Butler, AL 08/05/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 33 out of 33 people found this review useful. 2 of 174 Categories Comments Great for these types of students UAB is for you if you are interested in - -Sciences, such as chemistry, biology, etc. -Graduate school-dentistry, medical, health professions, etc. -Diversity -Long-life friendships Tips for prospective students Words of advice: If you are up for the challenge of your life with hard course work, networking with faculty and other students, participating in fun-filled activities and programs, then pursue it! You will not be disappointed. I am currently a sophomore at UAB, and many people would say that after a year or so it gets boring. Well, it doesn't. There is always something new happening each day, which makes UAB so wonderful. That's what makes it so unique. Bang for the buck As with any university, the price can be expensive, especially since the economy becuase of
